business.headline: New Income Tax bill: Has it really been simplified for taxpayers?The proposed income tax bill seeks to simplify and revamp the Income Tax Act of 1961, which has often been criticised for its complexity, making it challenging for ordinary taxpayers to navigate.
New UPI transaction rule: All you need to know about auto chargeback processThe changes are primarily regarding auto acceptance and rejection of chargebacks, thereby making the system more efficient.
Sensex, Nifty end lower as FIIs continue to exit Dalal StreetThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 199.76 points to end at 75,939.21, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 102.15 points to close at 22,929.25.

Explained: Why Vodafone Idea share price tumbled nearly 6%VI shares were down 5.09% to Rs 8.22 at around 3:15 pm. Earlier during the trading session, shares of the telecom operator fell as much as 6%.

Ambani family richest in Asia. Check which Indian families made the top 20The Ambani family tops Bloomberg's list of Asia's 20 richest families. The family's flagship company, Reliance Industries, is presently headed by Mukesh Ambani, son of late industrialist Dhirubhai Ambani.

RBI curbs on New India Co-operative Bank: How does it impact customers?New India Co-operative Bank has been struggling with financial losses in recent years. According to its annual report, the bank recorded a loss of Rs 22.78 crore in the financial year ending March 2024, following a loss of Rs 30.75 crore in the previous year.

New India Co-operative Bank's financial operations halted after notice from RBIThe Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has restricted Mumbai-based New India Co-operative Bank from issuing loans, accepting deposits, or permitting withdrawals for six months. The move comes amid concerns over the bank's financial health and liquidity.

Not Trump's tariffs, but this is what's making stock market investors anxiousThe stock market jitters have occurred despite government measures, including tax relief and the Reserve Bank of India's (RBI) decision to reduce the repo rate by 25 basis points.

RBI issues notice to halt all financial operations of New India Co-operative BankRBI's move comes after what it called 'recent material developments' at the bank. Although the central bank did not provide specific details, it stated that these directions were issued to protect depositors' interests.

New income tax bill: All you questions answeredThe new income tax bill, compared to the Income Tax Act, 1961, is nearly half the size, containing 259,676 words, 23 chapters, 536 sections, 57 tables and 46 formulae.

Sensex tanks over 600 points: Why is the stock market down today?The Sensex and Nifty fell sharply after rising in early trade. Here are three things you need to know about today's stock market weakness.

Explained: Why Senco Gold shares crashed 20% after Q3 results Senco Gold share price: In the third quarter, Senco Gold reported a nearly 70% drop in consolidated net profit to Rs 33 crore, compared to Rs 109 crore in the same period last year.

entertainment.headline: Fighting zombies to playing a psychopath: The many faces of Choi Woo-shikLong before Choi Woo-shik became a household name thanks to Parasite, he had already amassed an impressive filmography. On this week's K-Fix, we'll have a closer look at his notable works, crafted long before his Oscar-winning turn in Parasite.

The Potato Lab trailer: Kang Tae-oh is set to headline upcoming rom-comThe trailer for The Potato Lab, a romantic comedy-drama starring Kang Tae-oh and Lee Sun-bin, has been released. The series, set in a rural potato research institute, promises a blend of romance, comedy, and workplace drama.

Dhoom Dhaam review: Romance meets thrill in this Yami Gautam-Pratik Gandhi filmReleased-Fri Feb 14, 2025Dhoom Dhaam movie review: Dhoom Dhaam blends romance with action and comedy, offering a refreshing alternative to traditional Valentine's Day films. Starring Yami Gautam and Pratik Gandhi, the movie delivers a thrilling and entertaining experience perfect for a cosy night in.

Scared of Loving You: Selena Gomez's new song for her Valentine Benny Blanco out Lovebirds Selena Gomez and Benny Blanco have now collaborated for a new album titled I Said I Love You First. On the occasion of Valentine's Day 2025, Selena released the first single from the album, Scared of Loving You.

Ilaiyaraaja appears in Court in dispute with music company over his compositionsIn 2010, Music Master filed a lawsuit seeking a ban on the use of these songs on YouTube and social media platforms, calling it "unauthorised".

Are K-Drama men written by women too good to be true? | Valentine Special K-drama male leads have captivated audiences with their idealised traits, offering a romantic fantasy of the perfect partner. These characters, crafted by female screenwriters, challenge traditional portrayals. This Valentine's Day we analyse if they are too good to be true.
Prime Video's Rings of Power renewed for third seasonPrime Video's Rings of Power has been renewed for the third installment, the makers announced recently. Its second season was released last year.

Mrs director Arati Kadav on backlash over missing credits: Glad it was called outDirector Arati Kadav addresses the backlash over Mrs not crediting The Great Indian Kitchen in the trailer, stressing the need for proper recognition. Mrs, starring Sanya Malhotra, is streaming on Zee5.

Viral video: Kanan Gill made same remark as Ranveer Allahbadia years agoAs Ranveer Allahbadia faces backlash for his India's Got Latent remark, an old video of Kanan Gill asking the same question resurfaces on the internet.

Kanye West, Bianca Censori heading for divorce? Team clarifiesIt was previously reported that singer-rapper Kanye West and his wife, Bianca Censori, had split and were headed for divorce. However, a recent development has refuted these claims, labelling them as "tabloid rumours."

Sanya Malhotra's Mrs. makes questions on marital rape, mechanical sex personalImagine a woman bleeding for five days in a month, and those five days being the most peaceful in her life because she can finally refuse sex to her husband. He can't assert his power over her. That's how Sanya Malhotra's 'Mrs.' unsettles you and makes you think.

Singer-composer Vishal Dadlani meets with an accident, undergoes treatmentVishal Dadlani of the Vishal-Sheykhar duo is undergoing treatment after an accident, leading to the postponement of their upcoming concert scheduled for March 2.

Not just Gujarat, all Samay Raina shows cancelled amid India's Got Latent rowSamay Raina's shows in India have been cancelled following controversy around India's Got Latent, with Gujarat shows being the first to be affected.

Singer Jonita Gandhi to perform at Lollapalooza India, will open for Shawn MendesJonita Gandhi will perform at Lollapalooza India on March 8, opening for Shawn Mendes. Her latest single Channa has also been nominated for a Juno Award.

Twilight star Taylor Lautner to return as werewolf in self-aware werewolf seriesTwilight star Taylor Lautner is returning to portray a werewolf in the self-aware Amazon series. Details of the show are yet to be revealed.

Anupamaa actor Rupali Ganguly seeks blessings at Maha KumbhActor Rupali Ganguly visited Maha Kumbh in Prayagraj with her family. She shared moments from her spiritual visit, including performing aarti, attending a hawan, and meeting a saint.

Nawazuddin Siddiqui begins Raat Akeli Hai 2 shooting in LucknowActor Nawazuddin Siddiqui has begun Raat Akeli Hai 2 shooting in Lucknow. The actor will be seen sharing screen space with Chitragandha Singh.

Olivia Swann on NCIS: Sydney, her character's growth & challenges In this exclusive interview with India Today's Bhavna Agarwal, Olivia Swann dives deep into her role in NCIS: Sydney, sharing insights into her character's journey, development, and challenges throughout the series.

Rozlyn Khan sues Ankita Lokhande for defamation over 'cheap' remark TV actor Rozlyn Khan took legal action against Ankita Lokhande's recent comments. Ankita had called her 'cheap', for her claims about Hina Khan's cancer battle.

Jackson Wang makes a powerful comeback with High Alone from Magic Man 2Jackson Wang drops a new single, High Alone, that marks the beginning of his new album, MAGIC MAN 2. The album promises a deep dive into themes of identity and personal transformation, set against a backdrop of atmospheric production and introspective lyrics.

Actor John Lithgow approached to play Albus Dumbledore in Harry Potter seriesAward-winning American actor John Lithgow has reportedly been approached to play the iconic character of Hogwarts principal Albus Dumbledore in HBO's Harry Potter series.

Rupali Ganguly's stepdaughter calls her 'evil step lady', issues clarificationRupali Ganguly's stepdaughter, Esha Verma, clarified her viral social media post against the actor. Esha requested privacy.

Truth behind viral video of Ranveer Allahbadia crying over 'loss of work'Amid backlash over India's Got Latent, an old video of Ranveer Allahbadia crying resurfaces. In the video, the podcaster is seen breaking down over 'loss of work'.

Jonas Brothers hint at big change for 2025, shocked fans ask, 'another breakup?'The Jonas Brothers shared a letter on social media that briefly sent fans into a panic. In it, they hinted at their 2025 lineup and expressed gratitude to their fans for supporting them throughout their musical journey.

Kapil Sharma's 'Maa Baap ki Kabaddi' joke goes viral amid Ranveer Allahbadia rowAmid the controversy over Ranveer Allahbadia's comment on Samay Raina's show India's Got Latent, an old clip of Kapil Sharma joking about kids watching "maa baap ki kabaddi" is going viral.

Watch: Did AR Rahman refer to Ranveer Allahbadia row at Chhaava music launch?AR Rahman made a humorous remark at the Chhaava music launch that has led to speculation about its connection to the recent controversy involving Ranveer Allahbadia and Samay Raina.

Ed Sheeran's India dump features photo from football match with John AbrahamSinger Ed Sheeran shared his India dump, which also featured a glimpse of his football match with Bollywood actor John Abraham. Sheeran is in India for his Mathematics Tour.

Aly Goni feels Samay Raina was 'forced' to delete India's Got Latent episodesActor Aly Goni has commented on YouTuber-comedian Samay Raina's decision to remove episodes of India's Got Latent. Fans have also reacted to Samay's decision on social media.
Odia rapper Abhinav Singh, 32, dies by suicide in BengaluruA rapper from Odisha, Abhinav Singh, died in Bengaluru where he was working for a private company. He was 32.

Kendrick Lamar's Super Bowl Halftime show is the most-watchedRapper Kendrick Lamar's Super Bowl Halftime show has become the most-watched Super Bowl show of all time, garnering an impressive 133.5 million views.

Too much to handle: Samay Raina deletes all videos from his show amid jokes rowComedian Samay Raina finally broke his silence on the controversy over Ranveer Allahbadia's remark on his show, India's Got Latent. He has confirmed deleting all the videos of the show, and also added that whatever is happening right now is too much for him to handle.

Amy Adams joins Javier Bardem in Cape Fear TV adaptationAfter Javier Bardem, actor Amy Adams is on board for the much-awaited Cape Fear TV adaptation. The release date for the show has not been announced yet.

Kanye West dropped by talent agency amid antisemitic, controversial actionsKanye West's controversial actions have led to his talent agency, 33&West, dropping him. The decision follows a series of antisemitic remarks and troubling social media posts by the rapper that have sparked widespread condemnation.

Samay Raina's show in Gujarat cancelled amid India's Got Latent controversyComedian Samay Raina's Gujarat shows have been cancelled following a controversy sparked by the latest episode of his show, India's Got Latent. The decision comes amid backlash after a distasteful comment by YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia on the show.

Sakamoto Days: With ex-assassin's potential match, the anime is raising stakesSakamoto Days follows the story of a legendary assassin who transforms into a family man. Now, with the introduction of an equally formidable enemy, the anime might finally pick up pace and raise the stake.
Aashram 3 Part 2 teaser: Bobby Deol's comeback as Baba Nirala promises more twistsAashram 3 Part 2 teaser is out. The upcoming riveting crime drama marks the return of Bobby Deol as Bala Nirala.

Anupamaa actor Gaurav Khanna opens up on being colour-blind on Celebrity MasterchefTV actor Gaurav Khanna appeared on Celebrity MasterChef where he opened up about being colour-blind. He participated on the show along with Ayesha Jhulka.

BTS' V named world's most handsome man. Hrithik Roshan, Brad Pitt also on listBTS singer V aka Kim Taehyung has been named as the world's most handsome man. The list also features Indian actor Hrithik Roshan, Hollywood stars Brad Pitt, Tom Cruise, Bradley Cooper, among others.

Picture This trailer: Simone Ashley, Hero Fiennes to headline new romantic comedyThe trailer for Simone Ashley and Hero Fiennes Tiffin's film, Picture This, has been unveiled. It will release on Prime Video on March 6.

Jackson Wang announces MAGIC MAN 2 – A raw and vulnerable chapterJackson Wang is set to release MAGIC MAN 2, an album that delves into the stages of grief and personal growth. After a year of introspection, he presents a raw and authentic portrayal of his journey.

general news.headline: F-35 jets, Stryker vehicles, engine deal: Defence ties take off at PM-Trump meetThe meeting between PM Modi and US President Donald Trump saw the two sides agreeing to ramp up defence ties for more efficient arms transfer and procurement, and laying the framework for a stronger, technology-driven partnership.

Uttarakhand High Court relief to people facing action under UCC: Can approach usThe Uttarakhand High Court said that individuals facing penal action under the Uniform Civil Code can approach the court and will be granted a hearing.

Who all might lose sleep after Tahawwur Rana's extraditionUS President Donald Trump confirmed the immediate extradition of the 2008 Mumbai terror attacks accused Tahawwur Rana to India and said more would follow. The question is who is next in line. Before PM Modi's US visit, India handed over a list of 10 fugitives, including gangsters Goldy Brar and Anmol Bishnoi, to Washington DC.

Sunita Williams to return to Earth on March 19. Full details insideThe return of two astronauts, Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams, who flew to the International Space Station on Boeing's faulty Starliner capsule last summer, has hinged on the arrival of the Crew-10.

Why Valentine's Day makes some Indians 'cringe'A recent survey shows that couples are opting to continue the day as any other, with some of them claiming they don't believe in the concept of Valentine's Day.

New Kerala ragging case: School student's hand broken for 'not respecting seniors'Days after a horrifying ragging case emerged from a Kerala nursing college, another ragging case was reported from the state. A Plus One student in Kannur school complained his hand was broken by his seniors.
Hamas to release Israeli-American man, 2 other hostages as part of Gaza dealIsraeli-American man among 3 hostages to be released by Hamas on Saturday as part of Gaza ceasefire deal

Phone off, residence locked: Cops fail to get in touch with Ranveer AllahbadiaThe police further said that Ranveer Allahbadia's phone was unreachable. The police also said that they couldn't reach Allahbadia's lawyer either.

Elon Musk's gift to PM Modi: Starship's heatshield tile that flew to spaceStarship's heatshield tiles are hexagonal ceramic tiles designed to protect SpaceX's Starship during atmospheric re-entry, when the spacecraft faces extreme temperatures as it returns to Earth.

Will leave Bangladesh to PM Modi: Trump junks 'deep state' meddling rumoursModi-Trump meet: The unrest in Bangladesh and the subsequent attacks on minority Hindus were among the topics discussed by Prime Minister Narendra Modi during his bilateral with Donald Trump.

Shashi Tharoor's praise for PM after Trump meet: Encouraging, concerns addressedOn illegal immigration, Congress leader Shashi Tharoor backed PM Modi's stance but asserted that the treatment of undocumented Indian migrants deported from the US should have been addressed.

Chhaava review: Vicky Kaushal's film growls, but doesn't roarReleased-Fri Feb 14, 2025Chhaava movie review: Director Laxman Utekar's Chhaava, starring Vicky Kaushal and Rashmika Mandanna, is based on the life of Maratha King Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj. Brilliant Vicky Kaushal uplifts this strenuous film, says our review.

Dhoom Dhaam review: Romance meets thrill in this Yami Gautam-Pratik Gandhi filmReleased-Fri Feb 14, 2025Dhoom Dhaam movie review: Dhoom Dhaam blends romance with action and comedy, offering a refreshing alternative to traditional Valentine's Day films. Starring Yami Gautam and Pratik Gandhi, the movie delivers a thrilling and entertaining experience perfect for a cosy night in.

BJP's 10 major challenges in Delhi after historic winAfter a historic win in Delhi, BJP faces the challenge of fulfilling promises like cleaning the Yamuna, offering freebies, and improving infrastructure while balancing a tight budget.

Modi gets lot of tareef, India gets loads of tariffs from Trump on key US visitModi-Trump meet: A warm hug was followed by a firm handshake as PM Modi entered the White House, but the chill was palpable following the US President's announcement of sweeping reciprocal tariffs.

Pakistan rankled by India-US statement on terrorism, calls it 'one-sided'Modi-Trump meet: PM Modi and Donald Trump, in their joint statement, called on Pakistan to ensure that its territory is not used to carry out cross-border terrorist attacks.

Watch: Terrifying moment Humpback whale swallows kayaker before letting him goAdrian Simancas was kayaking with his father, Dell, in Bahia El Aguila, near the Strait of Magellan, when the massive whale surfaced beneath him, swallowing both him and his bright yellow kayak for a few brief seconds.

India's Got Latent row impact: Samay Raina's stocks grow, Ranveer Allahbadia hitA controversy erupted after Ranveer Allahbadia, during an episode of 'India's Got Latent', asked a question to a participant that included "parents" and "sex" among other obscene references.

SL v AUS: Australia all out for lowest total in Asia before Champions TrophySri Lanka vs Australia, 2nd ODI: Australia were bowled out for 107 in less than 25 overs as they suffered a 174-run defeat to Sri Lanka and lost the series 0-2. Australia are looking shaky ahead of Champions Trophy, starting February 19.

According to its annual report, the bank recorded a loss of Rs 22.78 crore in the financial year ending March 2024, following a loss of Rs 30.75 crore in the previous year.

26/11 plotter extradition, F-35 jets, trade deal: Takeaways from Modi-Trump meetModi-Trump meet: The key takeaways from the Modi-Trump meeting were the extradition of 26/11 Mumbai terror attack accused Tahawwur Rana to India and the F-35 jet deal.

Lalit Modi finds love again as friendship turns romantic on Valentine's Day Indian businessman Lalit Modi, former IPL chairman, revealed his new relationship on social media on Valentine's Day, but did not disclose his partner's name.

Drone crashes over Chernobyl reactor roof: Why we all should be worriedIAEA reported that there is no indication of a breach in the NSC's inner containment, and radiation levels inside and outside the site remain normal.

Impact of US immigration raids on Indians: What visa applicants need to knowMany Indians planning to relocate to the United States have been left anxious after Donald Trump's crackdown on illegals. As deportation of undocumented immigrants continues, here's how people applying for work visas can avoid complications.

Actor Kaveri Kapur, Shekhar Kapur's daughter, to be a part of Masoom 2Filmmaker Shekhar Kapur and actor Suchitra Krishnamoorthi's daughter, Kaveri Kapur, made her acting debut with JioHotstar film, Bobby Aur Rishi Ki Love Story. In an exclusive conversation, the actor spoke about being a part of Masoom 2.

Salman celebrates 'familitines day' with loved ones at sister Arpita's restaurantBollywood superstar Salman Khan on Friday rang in Valentine's Day with his family. The actor shared a special wish on the occasion on X.

On this week's K-Fix, we'll have a closer look at his notable works, crafted long before his Oscar-winning turn in Parasite.

BAFTAs 2025: When and where to watch the coveted award showThe BAFTA Awards 2025 will take place at the Royal Albert Hall in London on February 17. Indian audiences can watch the live broadcast on Lionsgate Play.

sports.headline: Lalit Modi finds love again as friendship turns romantic on Valentine's Day Indian businessman Lalit Modi, former IPL chairman, revealed his new relationship on social media on Valentine's Day, but did not disclose his partner's name.

Australia are looking shaky ahead of Champions Trophy, starting February 19.

Key New Zealand pacer ruled out of Champions Trophy due to injuryNew Zealand's injury crisis deepend as fast bowler Ben Sears was ruled out of the Champions Trophy 2025. New Zealand already have injury concerns with other players.

Rohit Sharma's class is different from the rest: Shardul ThakurShardul Thakur backed Rohit Sharma, dismissing concerns over his form, highlighting his class and recent century against England as proof of his resilience ahead of India's Champions Trophy campaign.

Go out there and express yourself: Virat Kohli wishes RCB for WPL 2025WPL 2025: Virat Kohli sent his wishes for defending champions Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB), who will start their campaign on February 14 against Gujarat Giants (GG) at the Kotambi Stadium in Vadodara.

Pakistan star Babar Azam faster than Virat Kohli to complete 6000 runs in ODIsFormer Pakistan captain Babar Azam completed 6,000 runs in his 123rd innings, which came in the ODI tri-series final against New Zealand in Karachi on Friday, February 14. He got to the landmark 13 innings faster than Virat Kohli.

India crash out of Badminton Asia Mixed Team Championships after losing to Japan India returned empty-handed from China after losing their quarterfinals to Japan 0-3. HS Prannoy lost a decisive match as India finished without a single win in their last-eight tie on Friday, February 14.

Good to see clear statement from Agarkar: Karun Nair after Champions Tropyh snubVidarbha batter Karun Nair responded to national selector Ajit Agarkar statement about why he was not selected for the ICC Champions Trophy despite his sensational form in domestic cricket.

How to book tickets for International Masters League ft Tendulkar, LaraAs cricket legends are set to take the field again in the International Masters League, starting from February 22, fans can now get their hands on tickets for the matches on BookMyShow.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
